name: iTangle (Nigel's Rope)
description:
Meet Nigel - a friendly frog that loves to eat blue sugar cubes!
Your job is simple - connect the blue cubes from their deposit to the exit portal using the rope so that Nigel can get them.

Beautiful graphics, simple to learn gameplay, challenging levels!
This game will keep you entertained for a long time. Levels are never the same and power ups keep you going.

Swipe with your finger vertically (up-down or down-up) and the current tile will rotate.
Swipe horizontally (left-right or right-left) to swap the current tile with the upcoming one (skips are limited and hard to come by so be careful)
Tap to let the cube flow over the next tile.

Collect enough "Lucky Nigel" tiles and enter a card game to find Nigel and claim your reward.
